text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Mayadykovsky Selsoviet, Dyurtyulinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 10 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 27 km from Dyurtyuli. == References == Category:Rural localities in Dyurtyulinsky District
title: Pokrovka, Dyurtyulinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
